sQuestion: One thousand tickets were sold for a baseball game. There were one hundred more adult tickets than student tickets , and there were four times as many tickets sold to students as to children. How many of student tickets , how many of adult tickets and how many of children tickets were sold?

sentences.sentence: One thousand tickets were sold for a baseball game.
There were one hundred more adult tickets than student tickets , and there were four times as many tickets sold to students as to children.
